casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Timothy HELMS. No. 183P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 23, 2007. Derrick C. Mertz, Assistant Attorney General, Roxann Vaneekhoven, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 17th day of April 2007 by Defendant to Appoint Counsel:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 23rd day of August 2007."
